Text:

If you want this up please seed!
Great upload dude, hopefully it'll turn out to be a good game! d/ling now.
yeah, great stuff. thank you very much!
game works fine, but im stuck at the large clock screen, right statue wont open! been waiting for 1 hour but still doesnt open..help!
also, the statue must open every 1 minute..but it does not..i found out that the gameplay timer doesnt work(on the menu screen, stays at 99:59:59)..can i fix this?
sorry..i meant the left statue.. the right opens with the use of a clock(weapon).. help please.. im stuck!

I have a problem with the music working, it only plays when there is someone important on screen like Death, however  everything else works fine and the music may just be a problem with my plugins, but this is a good ISO, Nice work.

Worlds GR8EST GAME EVER XD
Cool 2 play  Half Vampire & the story is GR8 2
keep this up and the world will be a better place 2 live in XD
Hi, I really need this game but every time the torrent box opens, another opens saying bad data or something else. Help me plz!

Nice to see people still seeding this =)

Who ever is having problems... It can be your computer or program that you're using. 

This game worked flawlessly on my PC and as a burned copy.

wwwwwwwwwwwwoooooooooooooo
this was the last good game ever made
Allso have been having problems with the music. Meaby it could be fixxed by a patch or is it just my settings?
